name: Common Black College Application
description: A platform enabling students to apply to over 65 Historically Black Colleges and Universities (HBCUs), helping break cycles of poverty. Over 250,000 students have completed the CBCA, with ~97% accepted to at least one member institution and 33% receiving scholarships ranging from thousands to millions of dollars.
role: Worked as a full-stack developer, focusing primarily on the admin-dashboard application
Developed optimized backend APIs (porting from VB.NET) using ASP.NET Core 6
Revamped the front-end in Angular including authentication screens, admin dashboard, and form controls for managing members, counselors, and applicants
Built analytics dashboards using Google Charts to visualize stats such as enrolled applicants by country/state, applicant-counselor associations, and application/enrollment data
